```{python}
#| label: fig-rx-mixer-simplified
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "An RX front-end using a current-mode (passive) mixer."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$s_\mathrm{RX}(t)$', 'left')
    dsp.Amp()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    mix1 = dsp.Mixer()
    elm.Line().at(mix1.NE).right(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/8).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Capacitor().up(d.unit*3/4)
    elm.Ground().flip()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit*3/4).dot()
    pos1 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    op1 = elm.Opamp().anchor('in1')
    dsp.Arrow().at(mix1.S).down(d.unit/2).label(r'$s_\mathrm{LO}(t)$', 'left').reverse()

    elm.Line().at(mix1.SE).right(d.unit/2)
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/8).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Capacitor().down(d.unit*3/4)
    elm.Ground()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit*3/4).dot()
    pos2 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)

    elm.Line().at(op1.n2).right(d.unit/2).dot()
    pos3 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{out,p}(t)$', 'right')
    elm.Line().at(op1.n1).right(d.unit/2).dot()
    pos4 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$v_\mathrm{out,n}(t)$', 'right')

    d.here = pos1
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2)
    R1 = elm.Resistor().right().tox(pos3)
    elm.Line().down().toy(pos3)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).at(R1.start).idot()
    elm.Capacitor().right(d.unit/2).tox(pos3)
    elm.Line().down().to(R1.end).dot()

    d.here = pos2
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2)
    R2 = elm.Resistor().right().tox(pos3)
    elm.Line().up().toy(pos4)
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).at(R2.start).idot()
    elm.Capacitor().right(d.unit/2).tox(pos3)
    elm.Line().up().to(R2.end).dot()
```
